ISSUE.TITLE: Concurrency problems with running tests through GitHub Action
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When running tests within a GitHub Action runner, tests intermittently fail with ObjectDisposedException within the database provider. This appears to be a concurrency-related problem. Configuring NUnit to only run a single test at a time fixes the problem.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7307 Fix CI tests due to concurrency problems (#7288)
